author: bridge-bot
content:
<KamilChNethermind> re: **@mediocregopher**
> In a recent commit we modified reth to not use parallel state root on low-core machines, that WARN is a side-effect of that, could probably be presented in a clearer way. Is the machine 4 cores or less?
yeah this one was quite weak like 2 CPUs

author: bridge-bot
content:
<KamilChNethermind> Hi all!

Due to naming changes in the EELS tests and some adjustments in test generation pipeline we would need likely to reset board once more to keep full clarity of results.

We have already one backup DB with historical results (gas-limit-benchmarks-backup) and we will create another one shortly.

Sorry for that.
